content.detailedDescription:
As stated, the object was silent, very large, well lit with many lights, traveling in a straight line toward the mid-hudson bridge in poughkeepsie.  this object had silent propulsion unlike any man made objects of this size. i new it was a ufo as did my friend who was with me.  he passed away in the late 1980's

we watched the object slowly move out of sight toward the dutchess county airport direction. then we got back in the car and left toward new paltz ny.
content.summary: Traveling in car with my friend on rt 299 toward new paltz ny. large object with lights moving toward us. we pulled over, got out of the car and watched the craft silently travel toward poughkeepsie ny in a straight line never changing altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside playing basketball at night with neighbors and family, there were at least 15 people out there. we finished the game and i looked up in the sky above the trees and seen 8 glowing/flashing spheres that were flashing red/orange and white. they changed several different formations, specifically a triangle formation before they lined up and disappeared. i have video near the end because my wife had to run and grab her phone this is right before they disappeared. everyone out there saw it and could not explain what it was, the only thing we could think of was a ufo. everyone was shocked and amazed, especially me since me and my wife were just talking about how everyone claims they see them but we never did and 2 days later we finally see them.

we cut the video short because as my wife was moving to get closer the camera went out of focus and by the time it came back in they were all gone except one
content.summary: Outside with family looked up seen 8 glowing sphere like ufos flashing white/red they changed several formations line up and disappeared one by one

content.detailedDescription: I had just left the ranch about 5 miles from my home town of belleville, ontario, canada. just prior to the intersection of hwy 37 from blessington road i noticed lights in the sky. at first i thought they were aircraft from cfb trenton airbase just 11 miles from were i was. i pulled the van off to the side of the road and got out. i could see they were not shaped like aircraft and had no lights around them, they were glowing objects. to the sw i could see 5 bright amber colored oval shaped objects coming toward me. they were moving very slow. too slow to be an aircraft. it took about 5 minutes for them to get overhead. all i could think about was that i had to get witnesses. i got into my van and raced back to the ranch about a mile down the road. at about 120 km/hour. on arrival i got out and looked up and there was nothing. it was like 2 or 3 minutes to get back there, they still should have been in site but nothing. i ran into the house and told the 4 people there, what i had seen. i went back to the car and drove home, feeling quite foolish at my ranting to those people over the incedent. i was watching the road and the sky on my way back. i must say these were not orbs, they were solid object with a deliberate straight line course from sw to nw. they kept the exact formation throughout the observation. i am submitting 2 photos of the location that i have put similar objects in to describe what it looked like. this is not an actual photo of the event. i did not have camera at that time. it shows what the scene looked like. photo 1 , shows road and van, bright enough to see. photo 2 shows same but much darker as it was during event.
content.summary: Oval shaped objects - very bright amber in color

content.detailedDescription: I cannot rationally explain what i saw tonight!  i was taking the garbage out to the curb when i took a moment to look at the stars because it was so clear and beautiful.  i noticed one "star" to the north of me that seemed to be flashing colors but was really sure.  i went inside to get my binoculars (no telescope) to see why it appeared to be flashing.  to my amazement it was flashing multiple colors of red, blue, green and orange.  then i noticed that there were three bright white lights in a perfect triangle on what i think was the underneath (bottom) of the craft.  i went to get my two sons (17 & 20) to come take a look, this is where it really gets crazy!  one of then pointed out that there was more than one.  he was correct and you could clearly see that they made a perfect triangle and we could not see any other stars in the middle of this triangle.  we watched and they seemed to slowly be going upwards away from earth.  then my son said that he thought he saw a few flashes of light near the one to the east. using the binoculars i was watching it and i saw a smaller "light" fly directly to the larger one and stop in the center of it.  i saw a red flash, then a blue one and shown very brightly in the center for about 2 or three minutes. i still cannot believe what i saw!  i was swearing and telling my boys about it and gave the binoculars to one of the boys who about 10 minutes later saw the same thing but it was the one to the north. we were all amazed, then the other son saw a flash of light, like a beam shoot from the one to the west and we all saw 2 smaller lights moving toward the one to the west.  the only way you could see the smaller ones is with the binoculars.  one of my sons called his friend who has a telescope the friend got it out and said that the one to the east looked like it was spinning or lights were spinning around it very quickly.  as this was happening it appeared that they were communicating with each other, one smaller light went from the north to the west.  they were fading up while we were watching so much so that if i had went out at 11pm i would not have noticed anything!  also, at one point two of us saw a bright yellowish light appear between two of them in the north east of the invisible triangle.  it was moving very fast and then disappeared in a flash, like turning off a light.  four of us saw something extraordinary tonight!  i have no idea what they could have been! i am really mad at myself for not getting my camera or video camera although i am not sure if it could have picked up what we saw.  mufon- you can contact me via email for more info or questions.
content.summary: Noticed 3 flashing stars that made a perfect triangle in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying in walpole with my friend, and i was busy taking photos of the milky way while she was inside preparing some dinner. i looked up, and saw a bright light - as bright as a close helicopter would be. what made it unusual was that it was moving very quickly - if it was a helicopter close to land, and at that distance from me, i would have heard something.
at this point i called my friend out and pointed it out, it changed it's speed several times. it then started blinking - but in a way that it looked as though it zoomed off then came back, zoomed off and then came back. it looked as though it was exiting and entering the atmosphere.
after a few minutes it was gone.
what made it more unusual was that it was heading south. as walpole is at the southern edge of australia, and the only airport near by was the small one at albany, i found it weird that something would be traveling towards antarctica.

later on in the evening, we stayed outside as the sighting got us very curious about everything! we were staying at a farm stay, we were on the "highest" point around us, and there was a dip/gully of animals, and then another hill the same height as ours about 500 metres away, with very tall trees. after a while we started seeing lights in the trees opposite our hill - but there were no "higher points" behind us, so to speak, so this could not have been a car or truck (not that there are trucks in this area). there was a very bright light that flashed along the high-tops of the trees (this is old jarrah area so the trees are very tall). my friend who is very sceptical on ufo kind of things was also unable to figure how the light could be projected so brightly and at such an angle.
content.summary: Bright light moving quickly, moving unlike a plane

content.detailedDescription: There were a total of yellow-orange colored triangular shaped lights ... they seemed to turn on and off in random sequence with each other .. we have witnessed similar objects previously.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange triangular flare type lights 1-2-3-4 appeared and disappeared numerous times, then moved across sky

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing in small park area on front street near corner of plum in erie pa at about 1050 pm. i went there to look at the sky for a few minutes where there is less light pollution. was looking north west and decided to turn and look north east. as soon as i turned around i saw it. there were 2 lights, star like, but moving slowly. no blinking. they were so close together, that they appeared to be connected. they were as bright as a near by star, but not quite as big. one light seemed a bit larger than the other. after about 2 seconds they started to fade, slowly until they disappeared. they flew in a straight line. they also seemed a little blurred around the edges, with perhaps and aura, or glow. i asked them to reappear, but they did not. i knew immediately what it was. i also got an immediate thought of a mother ship. 

 i then turned a bit further east seeing if they would reappear farther in the direction they were heading. that was when i saw a plane heading east. if they had stayed on course they would have met. the lights seemed to be about as far up in the sky as the plane.

 about an hour earlier i was outside with my daughter looking at the sky and said out loud, "i know you are out there ufo's, please show yourselves to me" i did not see anything right away though.
content.summary: 2 lights very close together, perhaps attached, when i looked up it was there then slowly faded away

content.detailedDescription: Cattle mutalation approximatly 35 head of beef cattle on a farm north of praire du chein wisc,farm own by a father and son, went there to ask them about it and what they said was all the cattle were taken ro madison wisconsin , they were told that they were not allowed to talk about this to anyone buy an order from the military,they father and son was so in fear that they bought pistols to carry with them on the farm. all the son would tell us was there was no foot prints of any type or tire tracks and the animals were missing all hanging body parts and reproductive organs.
content.summary: Cattle mutilation

content.detailedDescription:
Found this object in a photo i took tonight, did not notice the object at time of the photo. this photo was # 1 in a series of four pictures i took on my cell phone. the object does not appear in any of the other pictures. found the object a couple of hours later when i was editing the photos. i'm not sure if this is anything, but i thought it was worth reporting.

i'm submitting the first photo which i noticed the object in and the second photo i took, (no object) almost back to back.
content.summary: Object in photo

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, 5/19/14, at about 8:45pm, i saw a light out of a window to the ne of my house at 431 riverview road in pulaski, va.  when i first noticed it, it was traveling ne and vanished below the tree line.  i then saw another light through the same window similar to the first traveling e that disappeared behind the same tree line.  i thought the first light was a plane, although the trajectory looked too steep.  the second light looked more like a roman candle or meteor.  at this point i thought it was someone shooting off some fireworks or a random meteor shower.  i walked out onto my porch and was stunned to see something that was moving almost like a humming bird; it would hover, move in sweeping arcs, dart, and almost loop.  i couldn't tell how far away the object was or how big it was... from my perspective, it appeared to be a small sphere of pulsating white and bluish-white light; the light intensity went from spectacular to nothing.  while i was watching this light, it blinked out and i noticed a bright light from behind the tree line.  this light soon appeared above the tree line as well.  the two were indistinguishable from each other, and at first i thought they were the same object until i saw them both lighted at the same time... one was almost dimmed out and the other was just starting to glow again.  the two lights were never really close to each other, one looked to be further ne than the other.  as i continued to watch them i kept trying to rationalize what i was seeing.  there was no noise that i could hear and this is a fairly rural area... as a matter of fact, during this time, i don't even remember hearing a dog bark.  it looked as if the lights were moving to the ne of my house because the second light that had appeared from behind the trees slowly disappeared behind them again and never reappeared.  the other light that appeared closer to me continued to move in ways that i couldn't explain.  at one point my brain was telling me they could be lightnings bugs.  at this exact moment, the remaining light came toward my house quickly and got so bright it looked like venus.  i actually became a little concerned at that point because i realized this was nothing i could explain.  i called my girlfriend outside and told her to bring my camera.  i shot about 1:30 mins of video before we watched the last light completely disappear to the ne behind the tree line.  i'm still trying to rationalize what i saw; the new river valley airport is sort of in the direction i last saw the lights, but i have never seen anything move like these objects did.  in the video, we talk about them possibly being rc planes, but the lights on these objects got so bright and the way they moved wasn't what i consider normal... it's almost as if these things were swimming thru the air, if that makes any sense.  

please let me know if you had any other reports of this.  someone else had to see this.  i wish i had had my camera earlier, but i was afraid to take my eyes of these things.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 pulsating lights that moved like humming birds

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on 51st ave with my dog to my girlfriends house for dog
walking around 7:30 pm sunday may 18th, i glanced to the left of my windshield and saw a bright orange orb flying northwest over the gas station/business center at the n/w corner of 51st ave and bell rd.. i noticed that it didn't have any nav lights, i knew it was a ufo since i have been seeing a number of them in the last few months. i immediately turned into the business complex and drove behind the building and parked in the back where i had a good view of the object. it was travelling slowly at low altitude from the south slowly marking an arc to the northwest over my neighborhood. the object glowed and pulsated and as it flew by i flashed my headlights to see if it would do anything, but it just kept going as it got farther away the object seemed to twinkle and then go invisible. then a second orb flew by this one took the same trajectory as the first but didn't go invisible it just flew away slowly and disappeared into the night then a third object came this one was a little redder than the last two, when this object was in front of me it ejected what looked like a molten flaming substance which quit burning right away then it followed the same path as the first two and disappeared in the distance.
content.summary: Saw three orange orbs flying slowly from the south to the north west in a row the last one ejected material

content.detailedDescription: Object was observed with the use of a digital camera. not visible to the human eye. object appears to have been traveling at a high rate of speed. it came from the south west at a low altitude, then went straight up and out of sight. object was long and narrow, gray in color and almost transparent. the body was wrapped in an energy field and produced a twisting shape at the rear end.There was no noise coming from the object.I was standing in my front yard at the time looking for anything out of the ordinary.Without the ability to see these subjects, one must take hundreds of camera shots in the same location and review them later with the aid of a computer.
content.summary: Tube type, slender,long, magnetic field with a twisting at the back end.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and nephew witnessed round bright light hovering over tree line behind my house on my father's land last year 2013.  the light was white and bright.  on another occasion red.  they were just outside at the time.  the bright light not moving anywhere just hovering caught their attention.  they thought it was a plane at first but it never moved just disappeared.

during same time another nephew a couple of miles away saw a very fast jet flying low which appeared to be chasing something.  

they all have been curious as to what this light is.  why does is hover over a very heavily wooded area with a small water hole which we think may be dry by now.  from what i can remember as a little girl it's a somewhat rounded shaped area.

may 7, 2014 between 5 and 6am witnessed by a close friend who lives less than a mile away was out with dogs and getting ready for work.  again, that bright light hovering over same tree line behind our house caught his eye.  it was bright and just hovered.  in no more than 2 minutes it was gone.
content.summary: 2013 4 sitings, bright light over tree line.  flying jet chasing something.  may 2014 siting, bright light hovering over same tree line in wooded area.

content.detailedDescription: a friend and i were sitting at the cranes roost, in altamonte springs. we were just sitting there after having gone for a brisk walk and i noticed something coming out of the sky from the east. there were three red lights moving in a westerly direction. it appeared they were in a formation. behind them was another three, and then another three.  at first it appeared that there was a total of 12. the first 12 one by one disappeared into the night sky. then there appeared another set of 12 coming in formations of three. those 12 disappeared into the sky too. there was no sound, no motion, no flickering of light. there was just 24 solid red lights that vanished into the sky.
content.summary: Red lights in the sky in formation

content.detailedDescription: As we were nearing tyndall airforce base on our way to mexico beach fla. my wife was taking pictures from the car as we passed over a bridge. we noticed the object in our picture a day later. we had aslo recalled seeing multiple jets taking off from the air base shortly before we took the picture. at the time it just seemed like good timimg. now i am not so sure. now the window was up in the car you can see some reflection. but this looks nothing like the refelctions. it has no visiable wings and no noticealbe tale.
content.summary: Found it n my pictures

content.detailedDescription: My son was at the gym in our complex. he came running into the house and said he and his friend just saw this massive round ship with lights pulsating from the side. i asked him seriously and went onto the deck immediately. lo and behold, this massive round shaped ufo with side pulsating white lights were moving towards pretoria. it could not have been an aeroplane or helicopter, it was silent.  it disappeared over the magalies mountains going sw towards pretoria and pelindaba. this is our second sighting in about six months. we do live close to pelindaba, south africa's main nuclear research center.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over hartbeespoortdam towards pretoria?

content.detailedDescription: This happened back in 1987 to me, my brother and a friend and we still talk about it to this day. others also witnessed it 20 miles from us and they said it was over them. we told our friends it was right over and above us. this ufo was giant compared to what they show on tv, like lights hovering and moving around in all directions. this was like a mirror was placed over the sky and reflected all lights on earth or city. this sighting made a strange humming light vibrating noise and we could feel it like a magnetic sense. we were mesmerized by it; it was stationary for about 5 minutes then suddenly disappeared straight up? this reminds me of the movie chicken little from 2005 where a small ufo used a mirror to camouflage itself���.Exactly like that but very large in size. i���ve told this story before to very few and they just look at me like i made it up. we were driving home from a late shift and my younger brothers happen to look up from the back seat in the car, he freaked out we stopped the car and got out. one strange thing we noticed is the rail road lights were going off but no train in sight. the car stereo also stopped working. after it left straight up we all stared at each other in amazement and felt like some time had been removed? i wish others would come forward and give details on this.
content.summary: Had us mesmerized

content.detailedDescription: Was in back yard and glowing object came towards me and over my house and flew north west at a very steady speed. no sound just a straight
content.summary: Orange glow star shaped

content.detailedDescription: At around 11 oclock at night we my wife took the dog out to the front yard. she then called to me to come out andf i saw an arch of orange lights.There were about 6 or 7 lights that seemed to pulsate. this arch was huge and silent. then they started to change from orange to white and disappeared from the left bottom to the right. when they all disappeared i saw another which appeared bigger coming fron the east and then taking it place in what was an arch. my wife and i have worked on military bases for over 17 years  and we know the characteristcs of flares and chaff. this was neither. i do feel different after seeing this.
content.summary: Around 11pm my wife let out the dog in the front of the house. she then called out to me to come immediately. when i came out i saw 6 or seven orange glowing lights in an ark not moving. they started changing to white and then disappeared one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: My father woke me up one day (this was in the middle of summer) and asked if i needed anything from the store. i said no and went back to sleep while my dad and sisters went to town to get groceries. i later woke up around noon that day and looked out the door window and i saw a 7-8' tall olive green skinned reptilian-like humanoid alien with a normal sized head and long limbs with long fingers and regular-sized all black eyes (no pupils). the creature appeared to be walking from right to left looking at the ground like it was looking for something. the creature was walking in the place where my dad's old barn used to be before it was taken down. there were small trees and old scrap metal and junk in that area when i saw the creature. i stared at the creature for about 15-20 seconds then i quickly closed the curtain, sat down on my couch and stared at the ground in shock/disbelief thinking to myself "what did i just see".(unfortunately, i had no camcorders or cameras at that time) a few minutes later, i got the courage to look back out the window but the creature was gone. it affected me so badly that i'm paranoid to this day sleeping with a light on at night. i have nightmares about aliens and sometimes wake up screaming but sometimes i have good dreams about them where we make peace. there are also times when in my dreams i overcome my fear with anger and actually fight with the creatures using super strength and my body's internal chi. i recall one dream where woke up strapped to a surface with aliens all around me and i got so angry that i used my body's chi to explode out of the bonds and beat up the aliens. i am still angry with aliens for what they do to humanity (according to abduction reports).
content.summary: Seven foot tall olive green skinned alien 50 yd away from house broad daylight

content.detailedDescription: Ufo  over   city sarajevo,  bosnia   just  after  flood   all  country   from water   real  ufo  just  fly  over city  and   looks  like  something  searching,red  white  orange  light  flashing    from  etv-extra  terrestrialcraft   real   sightings      ..  ..Peace  on  earth !!!
content.summary: Ufo  over  sarajevo,  bosnia  just  after   8  hours  city flood  from  water

content.detailedDescription:
I have read many eye witness reports of these black eyed kids one such report of letting two in the house. 
this is what happened, john mason was sitting in his living room at home when he heard the door bell ring, it wasn't too late so he didn't hesitate to open the door. upon opening it there were two children standing there, he said to the taller one may i help you, they asked if they could come in, that they were lost and my friend needs to use the toilet. the area is a maze of streets and it is very easy to get lost, so he thought nothing of it, they were looking down he thought they were shy. so he let them in, the one who needed to use the toilet just walked in and proceeded up the stairs so he shouted up to the boy its on the right, he said he didn't find this strange because most toilets are upstairs and the child was young so he didn't think anything of it.

he told the other one that the phone was down the hall, ���thanks��� he said and he started to walk down the hall, he followed him then john suddenly started to get a real awful feeling like something bad was going to happen, he became very nervous and a bit shaky, the boy stopped at the phone and paused, he asked is ���everything ok?��� he turned to me and looked up and that���s when john saw his eyes, john said he will never get that picture out of my head, i was so scared that i couldn't even scream as i turned to run down the hall the other kid was standing at the end.

john said he became very dizzy and struggled to stand up, the boy or thing walked closer to me and said that they had been sent to collect me, i still couldn't bear to look into his face, i pushed away from him and ran into my front room and slammed the door shut, i was in so much shock about what was happening i couldn't think straight, this is something that you don���t expect to happen. after standing against the door for a few minutes or so i finally got the courage to make a run for the back door, i ran to the back of my yard and jumped over the fence not looking back.John had a friend that lived close so he ran to his house, and told him the story. he convinced him to come back with me, when they got there we looked around the whole house but couldn't find them. since this happened he was having nightmares he was dreaming that kids with the black eyes were standing over his bed with there hands stretching to him!

there are some trends and themes which have emerged from black eyed children encounters, there are reports of foul odors that lingers following an encounter with the kids. also the black eyed children don't just appear at houses, but have been reported approaching cars, businesses, and even a boat. it is odd how the black eyed children seem to depend on being invited into locations.A black eyed child was actually invited into a car by a child while his mother was in a store shopping! 

after examining some of the similarities between black eyed children and other paranormal phenomena, black eyed kids seem to resemble the behavior of men in black. there also have been encounters between black eyed kids and children as well as black eyed children and pets. a man in dallas who was visited by the black eyed children had his pit bull charge at them and then run off terrified. 

there is a recurring theme of black eyed children encounters and that is how they seem to exert some kind of hypnotic control over the witnesses, perhaps in an attempt to force them to invite them inside, these 'children' may simply be projections used by entities that feed off of fear. 

these black eyed children witnesses are considered 'victims'. we learned how victims of black eyed children encounters often have recurring nightmares or prolonged stress as a result of their experience. this leads us to realize how difficult it is to study the black eyed kid phenomena, since it almost entirely relies on witness encounters. one case in london where a man encountered a pair of black eyed kids, turned around, and a third kid suddenly appeared are they interdimensional entities? 

one woman who began having memories of encountering the black eyed kids and underwent hypnosis to see if her memories were real or not. this leads us to believe the theories that the black eyed children are actually some kind of alien entity, since they appear to follow certain 'rules'. this leads to us reflecting on the possibility that these black eyed children are actually positive agents of change.

there is much more research to do on the black eyed children there are many more investigative reports to look at,more an more everyday, could these black eyed children be smaller versions of men in black in training? as i say we need much more research into the subject of black eyed children!
content.summary: It was cray cray

content.detailedDescription: I was out side listening to my head phone and suddenly my phone started acting up. i got a strange feeling to just look up, so i did. i looked up and saw a ufo was shaped like a top hat. it was actually right above a chem trail left by a plane. it hovered for a minute then shot upwards out of sight. it actually been coming back since this happened.
content.summary: The ufo was flying around a chem trail plane. i looked up and saw something zip by. i thought i was seeing things so i took a picture.

content.detailedDescription: On the 19th of may 2014 in pretoria south africa; i saw a greenish-blue light descend rapidly towards the surface. it descended a 500m height in 2 seconds about; swerved (seeming to pull out of the dive) and then dissapearing. all lights dissapeared.
content.summary: Saw a greenish light decend rapidly towards the ground area; then change direction and dissapearing. lasted about 3-5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the sky, looking at the stars and all of a sudden i noticed these glowing lights. at first, i thought that maybe they were some kind of spotlights in the sky, but because it was sunday and nothing notable was going on, i started paying closer attention and realized that it couldn't be spotlights. not with the way they were moving and blinking and how far down they went towards the horizon. it was about nine or ten objects at first. then they one by one disappeared, returned in pairs, and then vanished again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: it was 9 or 10 glowing objects floating through the sky then they all one by one disappeared. only to return again in pairs of two.

content.detailedDescription:
We had just finished are fireworks last night. and my friend noticed something in the sky and i turned and looked and it was a really bright red light moving at a slow speed. there were no flashing lights just like a plane so i thought to myself it has to be a ufo so i took out my phone and i zoomed in as much as i could and i took a few pictures and i had on picture that really turned out well. 

it was flying at such a low speed that it took about a minute and half from one tree to another which was about 60 - 80 feet apart until it went behind the tree and couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: A really bright red light going across the sky very slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding my bike home.
it caught my eye when i was looking around the area when i noticed this very very huge ufo that  was basically maybe 200 ft above the power lines but i was not seen 
the object looked to be as big as two base ball fields and was moving over houses i was scared but awh struck of what i was observing. after the sighting i was feeling amazed  and scared. i lost sight of the object when it went over some houses.
content.summary: Very very very big ufo

content.detailedDescription: On a late summer evening, in big sur, cal. myself and two others drove up ocr (old coast road)to watch the meteor shower. we park and it's bout 9pm or so. fred can't get the radio to play anything but static. so we just look up and watch the showers! after a lil while, i see some light kinda flashing below us on the mountain side coming up! so i say out loud, "some stupid person is trying to 4 wheel drive up the mountain!!!" i can't see anything at this point, and start to look up some more. the light from below is starting to really get my attention, after some time, so i stop looking up, which by the way is a spectacular sight! and walk across the dirt rd, to the edge of the cliff and looked down!....  ok, let me give you a look at my surroundings! my elevation is maybe 800' above sea level, in front of me, (west) i see point sur a navel base no longer in use, and slightly to my left next to point sur, is andrew molara state park. and the ocean! also point sur has a light house on a natural mount formation. highway one sets in-between those locations and a cattle ranch, (there has been skinning's, and mutilation's) that comes way up passed ocr.  also i might mention where my location is, when you look towards pch highway one you can barley see the cars cause there so tiny from being so far away. now, "i saw a very large rectangle ufo slowly hovering away from my direction, bout 50 yards down the mountain, and bout 15 feet above the ground scanning the area w/ blue, and yellow, white and purple lights! i immediately called out to my friends to come look! and i sceamed "hey come and take me away, im ready!" by this time my friends are freaking out!!! and pull me back away from the edge, and this thing turned around and came up the mt. towards us!!! my friends let me go and the ufo came up eye to eye w/ us and shined very bright lights at us, i could see window in what looked like the front w/ humanoid figures 4=5 in the windows, at the same time out beond the ocean a cloud formation in a circle tube like formation, came in-land stright for us, ufo turn around and went into the cloud completly and they together went out across the sea!
content.summary: Up old coast rd, whatching meadior showers, 3 of us, looking up, while below us a jeep or some 4 wheeler is trying to make his way up the mt. i thought, after a few min"s i went to the edge of the clift and saw what was causing the lights below us! 25word

content.detailedDescription:
I was at galt ocean mile beach in ft lauderdale fl. that evening looking east out over the ocean at the star filled sky,looking for shooting stars.
i noticed an object  falling from the heavens and as it got closer i could see that it was 3 saucers flying in formation, as one. 
they had no lights,no windows,no sound,no sign of propulsion,they were illuminated like the moon.
their fall toward earth was not in a straight line,but as if they were on a gigantic ferris wheel.They stopped and were motionless,maybe a mile above the ocean,for maybe 20 seconds.Then they streaked upward and made a 45 degree turn toward the se and were gone in a warp speed blur.
my friend and i turned to each other in total amazement.It will always be etched in my brain.       
this was 41 years ago. the technology i witnessed that night remains light years away from us.
content.summary: 3 ships in formation slowly falling toward earth in an arc like coming over the top of a ferris wheel,hovered,streaked up than sharp right at i was at the beachlight speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside our home on the front porch smoking - i saw a pinky rose orange colored orb fly fast towards our house from west  - i immediately called my husband to come quickly to see it - it was flying towards a north east straightline direction over the roof - i ran to get our camera (on our cell phone) and quickly returned back outside our house - i pointed the phone to the object and instantly the object turned its light of - i tried to take picture -  but i-phone would not work. we watched it as it disappeared. once the orb had disappeared we came back inside our house and after a few minutes our iphone worked normally again.  it was unusual because of the color and speed - we had seen something similar about a year ago when the same type of flying colored orb had hovered directly above our car - (that sighting caused us to pull off the road get out of our vehicle and we observed it shoot upwards but we were just amazed at the time, no bad feelings at all.  today however, this evening i felt a little scared after this sighting, even though we came back into our house, i felt a little unsettled. i kept thinking it is up there somewhere and can see us.   my husband said he feels curious and perplexed - questioning - trying to make sense of it.  i think i am more unsettled from this event today, because my husband had a very bad nightmare last night and both these things together has spooked me a little.
content.summary: Pinky rose orange colored orb flew fast from west to north east straight line and turned its light off when we got our iphone camera to take picture - iphone would not work. once the orb had disappeared after a few minutes our iphone worked normally again
